description: This file defines a Flutter screen widget for user login, including form fields for email and password, and manages login interactions with a provider-based state management.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the login screen UI

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the login form, inputs, and interactions

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen, including form fields and buttons

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up the text editing controllers when the widget is disposed
